Standard.Name: Calico's Rogues Snare a Merchant Ship 1.3.1

English.Text: The courageous crew triumph, rushing aboard quickly enough for it to be a surprise, before blowing half the pirates to dust with their blunderbuses. The remaining pirates drop their weapons, and the merchants are able to come out of hiding. 'A great reward is in order', they say, giving you a generous portion of the recovered loot.
